releases.summary: This release focuses on behind-the-scenes improvements to our release process.
releases.seoSummary: Internal improvements to the Stuga Home Assistant dashboard app release process for smoother future updates.

sections.title: Changes
items: No user-facing changes in this version - just internal fixes to make future releases smoother

releases.summary: This release brings temperature display improvements and better support for Android sideloading.
releases.seoSummary: Enhanced temperature sensor display in your Home Assistant dashboard with Celsius and Fahrenheit support, plus Android APK sideloading for Obtainium users.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Temperature now displays in your preferred unit (Celsius or Fahrenheit) based on your Home Assistant settings
Android users can now download the APK directly for sideloading or use with Obtainium

sections.title: Bug fix
items: Removed accidental advertising ID from Android manifesto

releases.summary: This release brings temperature display improvements and better support for Android sideloading.
releases.seoSummary: Control temperature display units in your Home Assistant smart home dashboard with support for both Celsius and Fahrenheit preferences.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Temperature now displays in your preferred unit (Celsius or Fahrenheit) based on your Home Assistant settings
Android users can now download the APK directly for sideloading or use with Obtainium

releases.summary: Control which smart home devices appear in your Home Assistant dashboard with new device visibility options.
releases.seoSummary: Manage device visibility in your Home Assistant dashboard - hide lights, switches, and sensors either in Stuga only or across your entire smart home setup.

sections.title: New Features
items: You can now choose to hide devices either just in Stuga or in Home Assistant too - giving you more control over what shows up where

sections.title: Improvements
items: Better error messages when there are SSL/TLS or DNS connection issues, making it easier to troubleshoot connection problems

releases.summary: Improved Home Assistant connection setup with smarter URL detection for both local and remote access.
releases.seoSummary: Simplified Home Assistant connection setup with automatic protocol detection for local and remote smart home access on iOS and Android.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Smarter URL handling when setting up your connection - the app now automatically tries different protocols (http/https) and suggests alternatives if your initial URL doesn't work
When multiple connection options are found, you can now easily pick the one that works best for you

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed an issue where the setup wizard wouldn't scroll properly when the keyboard appeared
Fixed a timing issue that could cause connection testing to behave unexpectedly

releases.summary: Stability improvements and bug fixes for the Home Assistant dashboard app on Android devices.
releases.seoSummary: Improved stability for the Home Assistant mobile dashboard on Android, including Huawei device compatibility and better touch-friendly slider controls.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Added connection diagnostics to help troubleshoot connectivity issues
Updated privacy policy to reflect our crash reporting practices

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed compatibility issues on Huawei Android 12 devices
Fixed modal sheets sometimes closing unexpectedly when swiping
Fixed slider controls flickering while dragging
Fixed icon picker scrolling issues on Android
Fixed room card layout and sizing inconsistencies

releases.summary: Display temperature and humidity sensors in your Home Assistant room cards with new customization options.
releases.seoSummary: Customize your Home Assistant dashboard room cards with temperature and humidity sensors, plus control which lights and switches respond to room toggles.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Redesigned floor editing with a cleaner, more intuitive interface
Room cards now show humidity alongside temperature
New settings to show or hide temperature and humidity in room cards
You can now exclude specific lights or switches from the room toggle
Simplified grid layout with a cleaner 2-column default

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Switches now behave correctly based on their device type when toggling rooms

releases.summary: Bug fixes for the Home Assistant mobile dashboard.
releases.seoSummary: Fixed video display issues in the Home Assistant mobile dashboard for a smoother smart home control experience on phones.

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed video containers getting squashed when scrolling on phones

releases.summary: Android app improvements for the Home Assistant dashboard with better compatibility and app store presence.
releases.seoSummary: Enhanced Android compatibility for the Home Assistant dashboard app with improved app store presence and reliable updates for your smart home control.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Improved Android app versioning for more reliable updates
Added screenshot gallery to the landing page
Added promotional video to app store listing
Updated screenshots and visuals
Improved compatibility with newer Android devices
Improved app store listings with better descriptions and metadata

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed Android app build issues

releases.summary: Organize your smart home by floors with improved navigation and editing in the Home Assistant dashboard.
releases.seoSummary: Organize your Home Assistant smart home by floors with intuitive drag and drop room management and mobile-first swipe navigation.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Show floor name when swiping between floors
Add floating 'Create floor' button when editing floors
Swipe to dismiss dropdowns and pickers on mobile
Smoother drag and drop when reordering room cards
Better contrast for accent colored buttons
New segmented control for hide options (replaces dropdown)

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fix keyboard covering search results on iOS
Fix cards jumping when starting to drag during reorder
Fix dragging cards between floors
Fix duplicate login messages
Fix connection status showing incorrectly on empty floors

releases.summary: Simplified Home Assistant login with easier authentication method selection.
releases.seoSummary: Simplified Home Assistant authentication setup with easier login method selection - no YAML configuration needed.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Simplified the login method selection during setup

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed missing text for switching between login methods

releases.summary: Drag and drop room organization for your Home Assistant dashboard with multi-select and cross-floor support.
releases.seoSummary: Organize your Home Assistant dashboard with drag and drop room management, multi-select support, and cross-floor room movement for easier smart home customization.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Added multi-room drag selection with visual stacking when selecting multiple rooms
Added ghost placeholders showing where rooms will be placed during drag
Added ability to drag rooms between floors by holding over a floor tab
Added option to disable room ordering in Advanced settings
Improved visual consistency of floor tabs in edit mode

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed floor edit mode exit causing unexpected page animation
Fixed edit mode sometimes opening on the wrong floor
